name: Potato or Big Minta Bronson: A Vegetable Love Story
name_original: Potato or Big Minta Bronson: A Vegetable Love Story
description:
Made dur­ing Ludum Dare 26. Potato or Big Minta Bron­son: A Veg­etable Love Story is an abom­i­na­tion and should be put down imme­di­ately. I'm sorry ma'am, but we sim­ply have no other choice: It's abra­sive, loud, rude, extremely scary, and barely makes sense.

IndieStatik's Ludum Dare 26 Round-Up
Phan­tom Green Studio's top 15 Ludum Dare
Fea­tured on Creep­yGam­ing

Game 11 of 100 in 5 years
